alert.note: Alert for Northern Outer Banks (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued April 30 at 9:25PM EDT until May 01 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas adjacent to the sounds. * WHERE...Areas adjacent to the Albemarle, Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds, Kitty Hawk Bay, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Oregon Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.4 ft, Moderate 3.9 ft, Major 4.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/09 PM 3.1 2.5 2.8 1-2 Minor 01/07 PM 2.6 2.0 2.0 1-2 None 02/06 AM 2.4 1.8 1.9 1 None 02/07 PM 2.5 1.9 1.9 1 None 03/09 AM 2.0 1.4 1.5 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
